title: TorrentRover 1.1.3 Portable
description:
Torrent Search Tool And Manager


Download, unzip and use.  It is portable and free.  Enjoy.  I love portable software.



TorrentRover is a torrent search tool that works with your favorite torrent client to help you find and manage your torrent downloads.
Simply type in what you're searching for and TorrentRover will produce a list of organized results from several popular sites. You can initiate a download directly from the search results - the program will launch your existing torrent client to download the files.
You can also create automatic, recurring rovers that can check for new episodes (e.g. each week) and automatically download new content, if available.
Other features include customizable search settings and filters, scheduled downloads and more.


Publisher	John Loper	
Price	Free
Version	1.1.3  
Last updated	Oct 08, 2016
File Size	6.45 Mb	
Requirements	None



Reality Ascent by Dragan Glavasic
Wake up!
